quiz_description: Test your knowledge on various topics. Also indicate how confident you are in your answers!

questions.question_body: What is the capital city of France?

choices.feedback: Incorrect. Marseille is not the capital.
Incorrect. Lyon is an important city but not the capital.
No, Nice is not the capital.

questions.general_feedback: Remember that the capital is the administrative center.

questions.question_body: Which is the largest planet in our Solar System?

choices.feedback: No, Saturn is not the largest.

questions.general_feedback: Jupiter is known for its massive size.
